title: Clarify: Issue creation API payload & media handling
body:
Blocker: Define exact API payload for creating an issue. Questions:
- Required vs optional fields?
- Should images be uploaded multipart/form-data or accepted as URLs/base64?
- Is an idempotency key required for clients?

Acceptance criteria:
- POST /api/issues OpenAPI path with example request/response included in openapi.yaml.
- Example: multipart/form-data sample with at least one image and a successful 201 response including image CDN URL.

title: Clarify: Authentication & anonymous usage matrix
body:
Blocker: Define auth requirements per endpoint. Questions:
- Which endpoints allow anonymous use?
- Which user identity fields are mandatory and when (name, phone)?
- How should mobile clients authenticate (JWT, OAuth, session cookie)?

Acceptance criteria:
- Auth matrix (endpoints x auth) added to spec.md or a separate auth.md.
- Tests: unauthenticated behavior defined for POST /api/issues and others.

title: Clarify: Event completion â†’ awarding SP (business rules)
body:
Blocker: Define exact conditions for SP issuance. Questions:
- How is attendance verified?
- Is admin approval required to award points?
- Max SP per participant and idempotency rules?

Acceptance criteria:
- Business rules doc linked from spec, sample ledger entries, and an idempotent award API example.

title: Clarify: SP ledger & transaction semantics
body:
Blocker: Define transaction model for Safa Points. Questions:
- Pending vs settled states?
- Reversal / refund semantics?
- Transaction id format and precision?

Acceptance criteria:
- Ledger model documented with sample transactions and balance computation examples.

title: Clarify: Rewards redemption atomicity & hybrid payments
body:
Blocker: Define the flow for redemptions that use SP + cash. Questions:
- Steps for reserving inventory and charging external payments?
- Failure handling and rollback rules (refund SP, release inventory)?

Acceptance criteria:
- Redemption API contract with hybrid payment example and failure scenarios.

title: Clarify: Image moderation & privacy policy for user media
body:
High: Define moderation policy and retention/visibility rules for images. Questions:
- Are images auto-moderated?
- When should images be hidden or redacted?
- Retention period and user deletion rights?

Acceptance criteria:
- Moderation flow documented and example test cases for flagged images.
